# fontName

**Instance Property**

The font used for the text in the label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var fontName: String? { get set }
```

```swift
var fontName: String? { get set }
```

## Specifying a Label’s Font

- **fontColor**: The color of the label.
- **fontSize**: The size of the font used in the label.

items.description: The size of the font used in the label.
items.name: fontSize
